components.name: link
components.doc: Phoenix.Component.link/1 – Generates an anchor tag that supports LiveView-aware navigation.

attributes.name: navigate
attributes.doc: Use VerifiedRoutes: `navigate={~p"/path"}`

attributes.name: patch
attributes.doc: Use VerifiedRoutes: `patch={~p"/path"}`

attributes.name: href
attributes.doc: External/legacy target. Prefer `navigate`/`patch` with VerifiedRoutes.

components.name: live_patch
components.doc: Phoenix.Component.live_patch/1 – Generates a patch navigation link within the same LiveView.

attributes.name: patch
attributes.doc: Use VerifiedRoutes: `patch={~p"/path"}`

components.name: live_redirect
components.doc: Phoenix.Component.live_redirect/1 – Generates a redirect navigation link to another LiveView or controller.

attributes.name: navigate
attributes.doc: Use VerifiedRoutes: `navigate={~p"/path"}`

components.name: live_component
components.doc: Phoenix.Component.live_component/1 – Embeds a stateful LiveComponent from HEEx.

attributes.name: module
attributes.doc: LiveComponent module (e.g., `module={MyAppWeb.ModalComponent}`).

components.name: form
components.doc: Phoenix.Component.form/1 – Renders a HEEx form with support for :let assigns and action attributes.

components.name: inputs_for
components.doc: Phoenix.Component.inputs_for/1 – Iterates nested inputs for associations or embeds within a parent form.

attributes.name: field
attributes.doc: Form field or association (e.g., `field={f[:addresses]}`).

attributes.name: :let
attributes.doc: Binding for the nested form (e.g., `:let={address_form}`).

attributes.name: for
attributes.doc: Explicit changeset/source for the nested inputs.

attributes.name: id
attributes.doc: the optional id of flash container

attributes.name: flash
attributes.doc: the map of flash messages to display

attributes.name: kind
attributes.doc: used for styling and flash lookup

attributes.name: autoshow
attributes.doc: whether to auto show the flash on mount

attributes.name: close
attributes.doc: whether the flash can be closed

attributes.name: rest
attributes.doc: the arbitrary HTML attributes to add to the flash container

slots.name: inner_block
slots.doc: the optional inner block that renders the flash message

attributes.name: flash
attributes.doc: the map of flash messages

attributes.name: for
attributes.doc: the datastructure for the form

attributes.name: as
attributes.doc: the server side parameter to collect all input under

slots.name: actions
slots.doc: the slot for form actions, such as a submit button

attributes.name: checked
attributes.doc: the checked flag for checkbox inputs

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.doc: the prompt for select inputs

attributes.name: options
attributes.doc: the options to pass to Phoenix.HTML.Form.options_for_select/2

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.doc: the multiple flag for select inputs

attributes.name: row_id
attributes.doc: the function for generating the row id

attributes.name: row_click
attributes.doc: the function for handling phx-click on each row

slots.name: action
slots.doc: the slot for showing user actions in the last table column

rendersByFile.actionBody:
def home(conn, _params) do
    # The home page is often custom made,
    # so skip the default app layout.
    render(conn, :home, layout: false)
  end

controllers.actionBody:
def home(conn, _params) do
    # The home page is often custom made,
    # so skip the default app layout.
    render(conn, :home, layout: false)
  end
